title: Pixel 3a Recording of Time Lapse Video recording failure
content:
Hi there,

I have made multiple attempts to make time lapse video recording on food processing which is developing over few hours. The natural idea was to do it overnight when I am not using my phone for routine operations. I have all the set up with lightning and tripod + developer option for always on while charging set to on. 
For this kind of recording I have to choose 120x speed and short recordings coming alright. 
The problem is when I am trying to record overnight. I had multiple failures there,
The latest attempt when I examined the result brought a mp4 file with size of around 300 MB, which I guess has been recorder over approximately 4 hours looking at the details  info of the file.
Unfortunately the file can't be played neither on the phone nor on external apps on PC. 
I have tried VLC Player - came nothing. 
I have try to import the file in Adobe Premier for deeper inspection. 
The result was ( see attached screenshots):
- The  Import reported Generic Error;
- File importer detected inconsistency of the structure [ Name of The file ] . Reading and writing this file matadata (XMP) has been disabled. 

I have not found similar  issues reported in the community and trying to get some advice if someone has come to such and any suggestions to overcome this, so I use the feature as Intended.

Appreciate all contributions in advance.

Thanks!

Svetlozar
